name: Stick of Heroism
description: Only to appear when the end of times come, this stick can only be held by a true hero of the cataclysm!

name: serrated can
description: You took a metal can and somehow serrated the sides of it. Be careful not to lose a finger when using it.

name: giant axe
description: Judging from the stupidly large weight and size, you can only assume this was either used by a Transformer or some sort of gigantic monstrosity.

name: plutonium dagger
description: While small, this dagger can puncture through some serious armor!
